addforce done

addforce_exercise_queue
')]]) end end end

Trigger.name: loot
Trigger.script: if kill_running then perf_running = false kill_num_kill = kill_num_kill + 1 tempTimer(1.4, [[send(kill_loot_cmd)]]) tempTimer(1.8, [[send("sac corpse")]]) tempTimer(1.2, [[send("x")]]) tempTimer(2.6, [[expandAlias("addforce")]]) end

Trigger.name: kill
Trigger.script: if kill_running then if kill_num_kill < kill_num_kill_max then send(kill_cmd) perf_running = true perf_check_issued = false tempTimer(1.0, [[send('hp')]]) else kill_running = false playSoundFile(sound_file, sound_volume) end end

Trigger.name: done
Trigger.script: if kill_running then kill_running = false perf_running = false perf_check_issued = false playSoundFile(sound_file, sound_volume) end

Trigger.name: perform
Trigger.script: if perf_running then perf_check_issued = false send('hp') end

Trigger.name: check
Trigger.script:
if perf_running then perf_cnt = tonumber(matches[2]) if perf_cnt >= perf_thres then send('ww') tempTimer(0.1, [[send('p')]]) tempTimer(0.2, [[send('uw')]]) if perf_cnt >= 2 * perf_thres then perf_wait_time = 2.0 else perf_wait_time = 5.0 end else if perf_cnt > perf_thres/2 then perf_wait_time = 2.0 else perf_wait_time = 5.0 end send('say '..matches[2]) end
if not perf_check_issued then perf_check_issued = true tempTimer(perf_wait_time, [[feedTriggers('\nperf_check_queue\n')]]) end end

Trigger.name: retry
Trigger.script: if perf_running and not perf_check_issued then perf_check_issued = true tempTimer(perf_wait_time, [[feedTriggers('\nperf_check_queue\n')]]) end

regexCodeList.string: 看簡易狀態不需要按那麼快吧

Trigger.name: chat
Trigger.script: io_file = io.open(chat_file, "a") -- the "a" means append to end of file io.output(io_file) io.write(matches[2].."\n") io.close(io_file) playSoundFile(sound_file, sound_volume)

Alias.name: delete old profiles
Alias.script:
deleteOldProfiles(matches[3], matches[2]=="maps")
--Syntax examples: "delete old profiles" -> deletes profiles older than 31 days -- "delete old maps 10" -> deletes maps older than 10 days

Alias.name: `echo
Alias.script:
local s = matches[2]
s = string.gsub(s, "%$", "
") feedTriggers("
" .. s .. "
") echo("
")

Alias.name: run lua code
Alias.script:
local f,e = loadstring("return "..matches[2]) if not f then f,e = assert(loadstring(matches[2])) end
local r = f() if r ~= nil then display(r) end

Alias.name: Send text to all games with :
Alias.script: -- prefix with : to send text or run an alias in all open profiles that have this script installed -- for example - :hi or :follow bob expandAlias(matches[2]) raiseGlobalEvent("sysSendAllProfiles", matches[2])

Alias.name: master
Alias.script:
path_cmds = {"re", "e", "e", "tran 4", "s", "e", "e", "e", "e", "e", "eu", "e", "eu", "n", "n", "n", "e", "n", "w", "ne", "n", "n", "n", "w"}
for index, pcmds in ipairs(path_cmds) do tempTimer((index - 1) * 0.4, [[send("]]..pcmds..[[")]]) end

path_cmds = {"re", "e", "e", "tran 7", "s", "s", "w", "w", "w", "w", "w", "n", "w", "w", "w", "s", "w", "w", "wd", "n", "climb down", "nd", "n", "n", "n", "n", "w", "n", "w", "n", "open door", "wd", "n", "n", "w"}
for index, pcmds in ipairs(path_cmds) do tempTimer((index - 1) * 0.4, [[send("]]..pcmds..[[")]]) end

Alias.name: ranger
Alias.script:
path_cmds = {"re", "e", "e", "tran 1", "w", "w", "w", "sw", "sw", "w", "s", "u", "u", "u", "u", "enter", "n", "n", "n", "n", "n", "n", "n", "nu", "nu", "nu", "n", "n", "n", "e", "e", "e", "e"}
for index, pcmds in ipairs(path_cmds) do tempTimer((index - 1) * 0.4, [[send("]]..pcmds..[[")]]) end

Alias.name: start
Alias.script:
if matches[2] == 'stop' then learn_running = false else learn_running = true learn_skill_name = matches[2] if not (matches[3] == nil) then learn_master = matches[3] if not (matches[4] == nil) then learn_num = tonumber(matches[4]) end end echo("master: "..learn_master.."
") echo("skill: "..learn_skill_name.."
") echo("number: "..tostring(learn_num).."
")
learn_cmd = 'learn '..learn_skill_name..' from '..learn_master..' for '..tostring(learn_num) send(learn_cmd) tempTimer(0.4, [[send('c')]]) end

Alias.name: stop
Alias.script: upforce_running = false

Alias.name: start
Alias.script:
exforce_running = true exforce_cnt = 0 exforce_cnt_max = 5 exforce_recnt_max = 2 exforce_mode = tonumber(matches[2]) if exforce_mode > 0 then echo("
exforce bell enabled
") if not (matches[3] == nil) then exforce_learn_cmd = "learn force from "..matches[3].." for 1" echo("
 exforce learn cmd: "..exforce_learn_cmd.."
") end else echo("
exforce bell disabled
") end send("exert force")

practice_running = true practice_cnt = 0 practice_cnt_max = 3 practice_recnt = 0 practice_recnt_max = 3 practice_bell = true
if not (matches[4] == nil) then practice_cnt_max = tonumber(matches[4]) end
practice_skill = matches[2] practice_skill_name = matches[3] practice_cmd = "practice "..practice_skill.." for "..tostring(practice_cnt_max) send(practice_cmd)

learn_skill_name = matches[2] if not (matches[3] == nil) then learn_master = matches[3] end if not (matches[4] == nil) then learn_rep = tonumber(matches[4]) end echo("master: "..learn_master.."
") echo("skill: "..learn_skill_name.."
") echo("rep: "..tostring(learn_rep).."
")

Script.name: deleteOldProfiles script
Script.script:
function deleteOldProfiles(keepdays_arg, delete_maps)
--[[ Deletes old profiles/maps in the "current"/"map" folders of the Mudlet home directory. The following files are NOT deleted: - Files newer than the amount of days specified as an argument to deleteOldProfiles(), or 31 days if not specified. - One file for every month before that. Specifically: The first available file of every month prior to this. Setting the second argument to true will delete maps instead of profiles. (e.g. deleteOldProfiles(10, true)) --]]
local keepdays = tonumber(keepdays_arg) or 31 local profile_table = {} local used_last_mod_months = {} local slash = (string.char(getMudletHomeDir():byte()) == "/") and "/" or "\\" local dirpath = getMudletHomeDir()..slash..(delete_maps and "map" or "current") local delnum = 0
-- Traverse the profiles folder and create a table of files: for filename in lfs.dir(dirpath) do if filename~="." and filename~=".." then profile_table[#profile_table+1] = {name = filename, last_mod = lfs.attributes(dirpath..slash..filename, "modification")} end end
-- Sort the table according to last modification date from old to new: table.sort(profile_table, function (a,b) return a.last_mod < b.last_mod end)
echo(string.format("\nDeleting old %s. Files newer than %d days and one profile for every month before that will be kept.", delete_maps and "maps" or "profiles", keepdays)) for i,v in ipairs(profile_table) do local days = math.floor(os.difftime(os.time(), v.last_mod)/86400) local last_mod_month = os.date("%Y/%m", v.last_mod) if days > keepdays then -- For profiles older than X days, check if we already kept a table for this month: if not table.contains(used_last_mod_months, last_mod_month) then -- If not, do nothing and mark this month as "kept". used_last_mod_months[#used_last_mod_months+1] = last_mod_month else -- Otherwise remove the file: local success, errorstring = os.remove(dirpath..slash..v.name) if success then delnum = delnum + 1 else cecho("\n<red>ERROR: "..errorstring) end end end end echo(string.format("\nDeletion complete. %d/%d files were removed successfully.", delnum, #profile_table)) end

Script.name: sound_file
Script.script: ------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- sound_file = '/usr/share/sounds/freedesktop/stereo/bell.oga' sound_volume = 70

Script.script: ------------------------------------------------- -- Put your Lua functions here. -- -- -- -- Note that you can also use external Scripts -- ------------------------------------------------- chat_file = '/home/erichang/wf_chat.txt'
